item.title: Macros that transcend the terminal
item.author: karanlohaan0@gmail.com (Karan Lohaan)
item.description:
So what are macros these snippets of code that are meant to execute other code snippets its a very meta concept like trying move big blocks

Introduction

So you had a good day at class maybe completed a few assignment scripts and are feeling kinda worn out that

you write a macro in your bashrc file

#function to compile and run cpp files
function ccc(){
    g++ -o $1 $1.cpp
    ./$1
}

and next time you just enter ccc filename

But then youre like what if i want to do a set of tasks on the browser

The ultimate macro building stack

pyautogui

Screen Recorder + ffmpeg

OCR

Ultimate use cases for the ultimate macro builder

logging on websites during heavy traffic

booking tickets on a known website

when youre too lazy to develop custom scripts or have made no headway after going through the documentation multiple times

remember with great power comes great reponsibility
